name: 特里斯坦·米列夫斯基
awards: 2017年 第67届柏林国际电影节 泰迪熊奖 最佳纪录片 (提名) 梦之船
name_full: 特里斯坦·米列夫斯基 Tristan Milewski
introduction: Tristan Ferland Milewski is a critically acclaimed award-winning film director from Berlin, Germany. His worldwide success feature-length documentary "Dream Boat" premiered at the 67th Berlinale, was released in cinemas in USA and Europe and is internationally available on Netflix. Tristan's latest documentary series "Make Love" was nominated for the German TV Award and the Grimme Online Award. It has completed five seasons and is available on Netflix. His work has received international acclaim in numerous publications including New York Times, Hollywood Reporter, Variety, Vice, I-D, Spiegel, FAZ, Süddeutsche Zeitung, and Huffington Post. From 1998 - 2007, Tristan Ferland Milewski as Senior Producer and Head of Factual Department at MTV Networks Europe developed and directed multiple documentaries, documentary series and broadcast formats.
